organizations: National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. players live longer than men in the general population, according to a study commissioned by the players union and sent by the league Tuesday to men who played in the N.F.L. before 1993.
snippet: N.F.L. players live longer than men in the general population, according to a study commissioned by the players union and sent by the league Tuesday to men who played in the N.F.L. before 1993.
